actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion from gross income for interest on deposits in banks and certain other savings institutions.

summary.text: Allows an income tax exclusion under the Internal Revenue Code for interest on deposits in banks and other savings institutions, and credit unions. Limits such tax exclusion to $100 ($200 if a joint return is filed).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion from gross income for interest on deposits in banks and certain other savings institutions.
